original: Forthmeiier, Axel Nordeman, major, Halmstad, f. 25/10/94 i Halmstad av dir. Joihn Johansion o. Annia Forthmeiier. G. m. Margareta Arsén. Barn: Hans f. 23, fänrik v. A. 6, Ake 28, stud., Kerstin 32. — Stud:ex. i Halmstad 14, off:ex. 16, SS 20, mil:förvalt-n:kurs 20-22, TOK 30-31. Fänrik v. Hall. reg. 16, löjtn. 18, kapt. 31, major 43. Reg:iadju!t. 25-28. reg :ikvartermäst. 34-37, reg :stabschef 37-38, tygoff. 39-43, batrchef, peirsDniailvåridsioiffiioeir. RSO, RDDO.
translated: Forthmeiier, Axel Nordeman, major, Halmstad, born on October 25th, 1894 in Halmstad to director John Johanson and Annia Forthmeiier. Married to Margareta Arsén in the year 19xx. Children: Hans (born in 1923), second lieutenant in the air force, Ake (born in 1928), student, Kerstin (born in 1932). He took his student exam in Halmstad in 1914 and officer exam in 1916. He attended the Military Staff College from 1920-1922, Tactical Officer's Course from 1930-1931. He was a second lieutenant in the Halland Regiment in 1916, lieutenant in 1918, captain in 1931, and major in 1943. He was the regimental adjutant from 1925-1928, regimental quartermaster from 1934-1937, regimental chief of staff from 1937-1938, and ordnance officer from 1939-1943. He was the commanding officer of a coastal artillery battery. He was awarded RSO (Order of the Sword), RDDO (Royal Dutch Order of Orange-Nassau).
